title: People with 'colored' names on the boards
body: How does it work? I just saw someone with a green font and sometimes other colors that isn't the normal 'brown'. How does this work?

replies.body:
Green - Player Behaviour - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries
Blue - Gameplay & Strategy - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/RaWrI4Hi-introducing-the-instructors
Yellow - Technical/Help & Support - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen
Purple - Not volunteers but formally recognised boards goers - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/GLk0EEmq-introducing-the-distinguished-members

So how do I become a formally recognized boards goer?
I guess I'm new to the Boards but eh, it'd be nice :P
I'm not too great on Player Behaviour (yet :D)
I'm Lv.20 so I can't be Blue :P
I'm not into computer stuffs so I can't be Yellow :/

And purple's my favorite color :D

Just keep posting positively :) We keep an eye out for new people to join. There are no open positions for actual volunteers atm (there's two of each of us), but there's no specific limit on distinguished members.

Just post helpful or interesting content we'll keep an eye out :)

they are volenteer's.
Color represents what for, green is technical support I think.
Blue is (Pretty much what I do everyday) helping others improve at league.

there are a few other colors but I've forgotten what they do.
There are boards posts about them.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=9E7FIrxa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-17T08:32:57.949+0000)
>
> they are volenteer's.
> Color represents what for, green is technical support I think.
> Blue is (Pretty much what I do everyday) helping others improve at league.
> 
> there are a few other colors but I've forgotten what they do.
> There are boards posts about them.

 hashtag YaseiDoubutsuForBlueBorder2016
How do we actually get them? Do we need to do anything specific for Riot like sign up to something or......

Nope, if we just had to sign up, then I would be colored either Green or Blur by now. (Most likely blue)

What they want is:

A summoner who will do this regardless of rewards or anything. (A volunteer)
A summoner who will not harass or mislead in anyway. (Don't be an asshole)

A Summoner who continues to help others in there inquiries. (You will have to keep this up for a very long time, I've been helping others for almost 2 years. But been helping others on the boards for about almost 1 year now)

Those three things pretty much is the jist of it all.

Basically keep helping others through, tech support (If they are having DC or CPU issues)
Help through- Improving (Trying anyway) there runes masteries, builds.
Help through support.

^ Some summoners get bad luck sometimes, some just need someone to talk too about anything really.
I get ALOT of summoners just talking to me about issues, through bad games, what they think about riot.
Whats going through there IRL lives, I postponed my little touney that I did just so some members could take a break and make sure that they were ok.


Also don't ask for it, they wont give it to you.
